meanings.definition: Not able to be cured or healed.
meanings.sent1: The doctor said my illness was uncurable.
meanings.sent2: The uncurable disease left him feeling hopeless.
meanings.sent3: Even with all the magic in the world, the potion remained uncurable.
meanings.sent4: Her broken heart seemed uncurable, like a shattered mirror.
meanings.sent5: The darkness of the forest was uncurable, swallowing all hope.
